subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The FIFA general secretary, Jérôme Valcke, is under fire because of an e-mail in which, he concedes, he suggested that Qatar "bought" the right to host the 2022 World Cup.
snippet: The FIFA general secretary, Jérôme Valcke, is under fire because of an e-mail in which, he concedes, he suggested that Qatar "bought" the right to host the 2022 World Cup.
